snippet.title: Mouse - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out this teaser for Mouse, a gritty, jazz-fueled shooter inspired by classic FPS and noir films. Join private detective, John Mouston, for an all-guns-blazing battle through a dangerous and corrupt city in this upcoming action-adventure game. This Devlog teaser features some early gameplay, showing off the game's 1930s-inspired cartoon Rubber Hose animation style. Here's a look at a few of Mouse's weapons in action, including the Revolver, Tommygun, and even some Dynamite.

Developed by Fumi Games, Mouse is available to wishlist on Steam. Its release date is to be announced.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #Mouse
